1.content: Are you a male? Or a female?
1.title: Gender

11.content:
Your name is Tooru Shingetsu, normal average human male living in the city of Fuyuki. You were a businessmen living by yourself in a descent apartment. It was night and you just finished with your job and got out of the building. You were tired and didn’t felt like cooking so you walked into the nearest convenience store and bought few rice balls and a drink. As you got out, you sighed as you unwrapped the rice ball and took some bites, you looked at the cars driving through.

“*sigh* nothing have changed since I moved out.” You muttered.

You took few more bites of food and drank some tea until you noticed something on the ground. You picked it up and it was a paper written in unknown language.

“What the hell is this?” You said.

You started to walk toward the subway station with the paper until you heared someone’s voice stopping you. You turned around and saw a tall man with brown hair and a cloth that were like an Christian priest would wear. You didn’t know who he was and he smiled.

“I can see that you have gotten yourself an summoning ticket.” Man said.

“Summoning ticket? Who are you? and what do you exactly mean?” You asked.

“Pardon for my excuse. I am Kirie Kotomine, a...working priest shall I say.” He answered.

You felt little uneasy as you were growing up mostly an atheist, then he continued.

“That ticket is special, as you hold that you are acknowledged as a master to summon the servant in the next holy grail war.” Kirie said.

“Grail? Look, sir, I’m not buying in this whole religious bogus ok?” You said.

“Don’t think like that. Infact, this might be your opportunity to show your true power.” Kirie said.

“...What do you mean?” You asked.

Kirie then took a step forward.

“The holy grail war, the war that occurres once every ten years. Seven chosened masters summon their servant and fight each other, and once the sole victor emerges, he or she will get an holy grail, one that grant anyone’s wish.” Kirie explained.

This made you feel intrigued. A mythical goblet that grant the victor wish? You thought for moment and then turned to him.

“Your not lying, are you?” You asked.

“I never lie.” Kirie replied.

“...let me think tonight.” You said.

“As you wish.” He said.

With that he walked away. You thought for moment and walked toward the station...
11.title: Story begins

111.content:
Next morning came and you woke up from your apartment. You still felt tired from work but luckily you had day off today. You stretched and changed from pajama to your normal cloth until you remember about the talk last night. You dig into your business cloths pocket and took out the ticket. The ticket were suddenly changed from piece of paper to gold ticket.

“Huh...summoning huh..?” You muttered.

You then remembered your friend who were in occult club when you two were in high school, and when you two graduated he gave you an special book that had details of occult stuff.

“What if that person was saying were true.” You spoke.

You looked for the book and 5 minutes later you found it. You put it on the bed and pointed the ticket at it.

“I summon anyone..please?” You spoke.

Just then, the ticket glew in light and the book glow as well. You narrowed your eyes as the book rose up, the ticket got off from you and got to the book, then the light bursted the whole room. You closed your eyes and once light faded away and you opened your eyes you saw a strange girl in weird cloth with short purple hair and a military looking doll floating next to her. You were in awe as she got her book, she looked at you.

https://goo.gl/images/CjoRRB

“Are you the one who summoned me?” Girl asked.

“Summoned..?..oh! Yes, I am. I am Tooru Shingetsu.” You replied.

She smiled and got off from the bed. You kind of having a weird vibe and she came to you.

“Nice to meet you, Mr.Shingetsu. I am a caster servant, ready to take order from master.” She said.

“Master? Me?” You asked.

“Yes, look at your left arm.” She replied.

You looked at your arm and saw an weird symbol on it. She explained that the symbol is the proof between the master and the servant.

“Ok...What’s your name?” You asked.

“For now, you can just call me caster.” She replied with smiled.

“I’m...ok, I guess?” You replied.

As you and caster got out, you two were...
111.title: The summoning

1111.content:
Suddenly attacked by a person. Caster immediately casted a shield to protect you and from the distance a woman rose up from the attack (https://www.google.co.jp/amp/s/www49.atw...)

“You...who are you?” You asked.

“So you have been summoned huh rider servant?” Caster said.

“Yes, I have. Now prepare for battle!” Rider spoke.

Both caster and rider battled as you looked at the battle, you hear someone’s footsteps. You turned around and saw a man with Hawaiian shirts and jeans on walking then stopped.

“You must her master.” You said.

“Yes I am, master of caster class. Now she’ll obliterate your servant!” Man said.

Rider attacks more and caster defends with little trouble then..
1111.title: Ambush!

12.content:
our name is Minami Horamitsu, normal average human female living in the city of Fuyuki. You were a waiter living by yourself in a descent apartment. It was night and you just finished with your job and got out of the building. You were tired and didn’t felt like cooking so you walked into the nearest convenience store and bought few rice balls and a drink. As you got out, you sighed as you unwrapped the rice ball and took some bites, you looked at the cars driving through.

“*sigh* nothing have changed since I moved out.” You muttered.

You took few more bites of food and drank some tea until you noticed something on the ground. You picked it up and it was a paper written in unknown language.

You started to walk toward the subway station with the paper until you heared someone’s voice stopping you. You turned around and saw a tall man with brown hair and a cloth that were like an Christian priest would wear. You didn’t know who he was and he smiled.

“As you wish.” He said.

With that he walked away. You thought for moment and walked toward the station...
12.title: Female

121.content:
Next day you woke up as it was you day off. You looked at your ticket that you’ve found, remembering what that priest said. You thought hard and decided to do this ritual thing He mentioned and changed and took out something that was might be useful. It was a piece of fur that your parents told it was a cursed one and you headed out to the forest so no one could see you. Once you got to the place, you made a circle and placed a fur and a ticket in the middle.

“Come, I summon you before me!!” You spoke.

Nothing happened and you sighed as if it was just a bogus until a light appeared and shined bright. You closed your eyes and once you opened your eyes you saw a female standing before you.

(https://fategrandorder.fandom.com/wiki/A...(Alter)

“Are you my master who summoned me?” She asked.

“Y..yes I am, I am Minami Horamitsu. And you’re..” you spoke.

“You can call me berserker Master, and you now have the the proof that you are my master.” Berserker spoke.

You looked at your right hand and saw a strange mark on your hand.

And then suddenly!
121.title: next day

1212.content:
“It seem like you’ve summoned it.”

You turned around and saw kirie walking toward you. You were still feeling anxious about this man as if he have something under his sleeve.

“Yes, I have. Now how this battle works mr.kotomine?” You asked.

“It’s simple: one master must fight other master, and the only one master shall be claim victor of the holy grail.” Kirie replied.

Berserker came infront, defending you from the man. Kirie just chuckled and just clapped his hands, congratulating you for the summoning then told you it’s now up to you to either win or lose the holy grail, and he left the scene.

“Well...I hope we win berserker.” You said.

“You can put your trust on me, master.” Berserker replied.

You then..
1212.title: Kirie appears

12121.content:
“I’ll take you to my home since I’m your master now.” You said.

“Alright, please take me to your home.” Berserker replied.

It took at least 30 minutes back to your apartment and once you two got back, you took her into the room as it was not too big but not too small.

“I’ll buy new futon so you could sleep..and some other stuff as well.” You said.

“Don’t worry too much master. I don’t want you to work too hard.” Berserker replied.

“Don’t worry about it. I saved enough money if stuff happens.” You replied.

Berserker nodded and you knew where to go but for now you needed to get your head together on this holy grail war thing Kirie said.

Just then, the door knocked and once you opened the door it was...
12121.title: Berserkers new home

121212.content:
It was your friend Natsuki Shitanabe. She had been your friend since childhood and once graduating high school you two went different party as you went to collage Natsuki went to the SDF.

“Minami, haven’t seen you for while!” Natsuki said cheerfully.

“Ah, Natsuki! Same here!” You replied with smile.

You two hugged and petted their shoulders until Natsuki noticed berserker. She didn’t know who she was and turned to you.

“Say Minami, who’s that lady?” Natsuki asked.

“It’s a long story, want to hear?” You spoke.

She nodded and you told her about what happened until now. She listened and was in awe to hear what you said and grabbed your hands.

“That’s cool Minami. I hope you win this grail war!” Natsuki said.

“Thanks.” You replied.

She asked if berserker had bed and such, and you told her you’ll buy it now. Natsuki told you she’ll give you her extra futon and some of the necessary items. You thanked her and once that was done, you...
121212.title: Friendship are great

1212121.content:
You decided to go with Natsuki since she was your buddy after all. Berserker came along as well to protect you as you three got out and went to the car, you all drove off to Natsukis house. It was 25 minutes drive and once it reached, the house were big.

“I knew you were rich, but I didn’t know you were this rich.” You said.

“Eh? Well, I just use my money for payment for bills so I’m not trying to be that filthy rich.” Natsuki said, “now let’s go in.”

You three went in and the inside were huge as there were chandelier and expensive pottery and such. She took you to the room and turned to you.

“Here’s the futons. I’ll get some more later.” Natsuki said.

“Thanks, you’re awesome.” You replied.

She smiled and told you to relax and left the scene. You and berserker...
1212121.title: New stuff

12121212.content:
You decided to wait for your friend to come back with more stuff. You looked at berserker and noticed her cat ears. You had the urge to pet her head so with no hesitation, you got up and petted her head.

“M-master!? What are-“

“I just want to see your reaction and how it feels, that’s all.” You said with smile.

You scruffed her head and her cat ears twitched. You then noticed her two tails moved back and forth as if she was happy. You scruffed her head more then stopped, going back to your area and sat down.

“Master..you shouldn’t just do that without my permission.” Berserker said.

“Aw c’mon berserker. We’re buddies now right? So we should be close as a friend!” You said.

“Master, the holy grail war is a serious matter. The master must be aware of her surroundings every time as I defend you.” Berserker said.

“*sigh* I guess your right.” You replied.

Few minutes passed and your friend came back with few items from kitchenware to cloths. You thanked her and she drove you two back home.

Once you got out the car...
12121212.title: Servants duty

121212121.content:
Suddenly berserker was attacked by a man with a sword. Berserker was ready to defend you and your friend as the man came and got his sword. (https://goo.gl/images/jBVqYQ)

“So you have been summoned, saber.” Berserker spoke.

“Yes I have berserker. Let us now commence the fight.” He spoke.

Both he and berserker started to fight as he swung the sword with ease, berserker fought with both her arms and summoned an bow/arrow.

“C’mon, you should hide!” You said.

“But..what’s going on here?” She asked.

“Just go to my room and hide!” You said.

You gave her your key and she nodded and went to your apartment. The battle were fought and you heard someone coming closer and turned around, seeing a female with crutches on.

“So you must be the master of berserker. Nice to meet you.” She said.

“You’re..his master?” You asked.

She nodded and smiled.

“I am Sachiko Koizumi, and I am intended to win this grail war.” She said, “saber! Do your best to defeat that berserker!”

“As you wish master.” Saber said.

He then stroke his sword toward berserker but she dodged it until he swings it up, making her getting a scar.

“Berserker!” You shouted.

“Don’t worry master, this is nothing.” Berserker spoke.

She then...
121212121.title: Encounter!

1212121212.content:
You saw berserker engulfed in dark flame and when it went away it turned itself into a big boar! You felt little scared by this as berserker ran, saber jumped and dodged her tackle. Berserker immediately turned and tackled him without hesitation and he dodged again.

“What the...!! Saber, get away we’ll retreat now!” Sachiko said.

“But-“

Before he could finish his sentence berserker tackled him hard and stomped him, making him cough blood. He immediately slashed her arm and retreated back to his master and Sachiko looked at you.

“I might guess the true identity of your servant, young one.” Sachiko said.

“You do?” You asked, “then tell me!”

“That’s for another day young lady. We’re retreat for now but do not forget this fight.” Sachiko replied.

With that, saber sheathed his sword, picked her up and jumped back to the rooftop and disappeared. Berserker went back to her human form and came to you with little blood on her arm.

“Are you Alright? I’ll help you get first aid!” You said.

“Thank you master, I truly am.” Berserker replied.

You two went back in and your friend came to you, telling you she saw the fight little bit through window.

“What was going on!? Why did she turn into a boar!?” Your friend asked.

“That’s one of my ability young human.” Berserker replied.

“Ability?” Both you and friend spoke.

She nodded “we servants have different abilities that defines our trait. I can turn into a wild boar if I have to battle.”

You felt little scared and turned to your friend that it will be alright now that the person went away. Your friend were worried about you but nodded and bid farewell and went home. Both you amd berserker got stuff to right area and once it was done it was night time.

“Well, let’s eat some dinner.” You said.

“Yes master.” Berserker replied.

You chose to eat...
1212121212.title: Big boar!

12121212122.content:
You decided to eat out since you didn’t feel like cooking. You asked berserker what she wanted to eat, and she told anything would be fine.

“Then there’s a good Chinese restaurant that I like. Care to join?” You asked.

“Alright, I’ll accept the offer.” Berserker replied.

You smiled and you got your wallet and you two got out.

Meanwhile, on the playground two people were fighting with servants. One was caster (https://fategrandorder.fandom.com/wiki/T...) and other were lancer (https://fategrandorder.fandom.com/wiki/V...) the casters master we’re female with glasses and had short black hair and had average cloth while the lancers master was a male with tanned skin and had black jacket and a hat.

“Give it up, master of caster. You cannot win.” Man said.

“I will not lose! Caster, be sure to win!” Female said with annoyance.

“I shall not dishonor the lady.” Caster replied, “let us continue, lancer.”

“You don’t know my power yet caster.” Lancer replied.

They continued to fight as the caster thrusted many punches with electricity while lancer attacked with her lance. They were about to go on climax fight until some interference came along. The man grunted and ordered lancer to pull back.

“I guess this is even for now. We’ll fight another day.” Man said.

He and lancer then left the scene while the female looked at the interference. It was a teenager and he looked at the caster.

“Wow, why does he have an lion head!?” Teen asked.

“He’s..special. Now we got to go, see ya.” Female said.

They then left as the teen were just in awe, he took out a cellphone and took a snapshot of them walking away.

20 minutes later, you and berserker arrived at the Chinese restaurant. You two went in, took a seat and looked at the menu.

“What do you want to eat?” You asked.

“Same thing as yours master.” Berserker replied.

You nodded and called the waitress. You ordered two mapo tofu and a tea. She jotted the note and told you the good shall come soon.

“So berserker..how do you feel right now? You know, after the fight?” You asked.

“I’m really fine. I shall protect you from danger until the war ends.” Berserker said.

You nodded and then you noticed someone tapping your shoulder. You turned and saw...
12121212122.title: Eat out

121212121221.content:
It was Kotomine himself, and he was wearing his usual robe. You didn’t know why he was here then he spoke up.

“I can see you’re here to eat dinner, hm?” Kotomine said.

“Yes, I am. What is your business with us?” You asked.

“I just finished my dinner as well, that’s all.” He replied.

You had this feeling that he’s up to no good and looked at him with some digust. Kotomine then continued to talk.

“I have forgotten to tell you about the masters abilities.” Kotomine said.

“Abilities?” You questioned.

“Yes. It’s about your emblem that you have right now.” He said.

You looked at you’d left hand, seeing the crest and looked at him again.

“With that on your side you can use command spells on your servants, so they can either become stronger, faster and such. You and other masters have three seals on their command seals, and once all is used, it is no longer available to use it.” Kotomine explained.

“I..see.” You replied.

“I do suggest using the seal properly or you might use it in bad shape.” Kotomine said, “now excuse me..”

He then left the scene. You looked at the command seal, and thought of what you shall use it for. You turned to berserker and noticed she was little worried little then a waitress came with a tea and handed it over, telling the dinner will be here soon.

“I will not use this seal for evil use, berserker. I’ll promise.” You said.

“I am glad to hear that.” Berserker replied.

After ten minutes the food came You two thanked the food and started to eat it. It was pretty spicy but you didn’t mind the taste. Berserker were not afraid to eat the spicy mapo tofu as well and as you were eating, you thought about the holy grail war.

(I will not lose.) you thought.

It took 15 minutes for you two to finish the dinner and once paid you two got out and went back home...
121212121221.title: Little chat

1212121212211.content:
Next day approached and you had to go to work. You told berserker that you had a job that you had to go to, and she understood.

“If you have any trouble, just let me know ok?” You said.

“But how? I don’t really know how to interact in this world that much.” Berserker replies.

‘Oh yeah, she know’s nothing yet.’ You thought.

You brought her to the telephone and told her that call her cellphone if something is emergency came up, and you left the the scene.

“I hope I did it correctly.” You said.

Just then, the phone rang and you got it and berserker spoke up.

“Is it on? Hello?” Berserker spoke.

“Emergency only berserker.” You said, hanging up.

You headed over toward the subway station, paid the price and went into the subway. It was little crowded but you handled it. After 30 minutes you arrived at your job and you went back to changing room and changed your uniform until one person spoke up.

“Man, about last night. Some weird fight was going on.” One man said.

“”I know, a lion headed man and a wing headed female? That’s crazy!” Other man said.

You thought that must be the grail war, and you must be aware of where you are or your next. You then got ready to get out and gotten ready to work and punched in for day shift. As you did your work, there were no trouble until you saw lancers master and his servant came into the restaurant.

“Welcome, Minami! You have a guest!” Cashier said.

“Me!? We-welcome..please follow me.” You said.

Do they suspect you?
1212121212211.title: Work time

info.description: I only ask for everyone is to be respectful and have good grammar.
